name: Block Puzzle POP
description:
Great fun and easy to play! Anyone can pick up and play Block Puzzle POP!

Find and tap 2 or more blocks of the same color.
Blocks are cleared when their colors match.
Try tapping more than 2 block to get a high score.

Block Puzzle POP features colorful rules and methods that anyone can pick up and learn quickly.

▶ Block Puzzle POP Official Fan Page : https://www.facebook.com/superbox01

- This game supports '한국어', 'Indonesian', 'Bahasa malay', 'English', '日本語', '中文简体', '中文繁體', 'Deutsch', 'français', 'Español', 'ไทย', 'Русский', 'Arabic', 'Portuguese', 'Turkish', 'Italian'.

【Block Puzzle POP Features】
▣ An addictive game enjoyed by people from all over the world.
▣ A brain game that will increase your concentration.
▣ Featuring a fun infinite mode that can be played endlessly with a variety of colorful items!
▣ Enjoy over 100 special stage modes!
▣ Compete with the rankings of users worldwide.
▣ No Wi-Fi, no problem! Play any time with or without an internet connection.
▣ A small game that can be downloaded on any device!
▣ Supporting 16 languages and all tablet devices!

【How to play Block Puzzle POP】
▣ Tap 2 or more blocks to match the colors!
▣ Use hidden items by removing more than 5 blocks!

- This game is acceptable for purchasing the items partially. When purchasing the items, the additional costs could be occurred and limited Consumer Right of Defense according to the item types.

▶ Let's Enjoy SUPERBOX ◀
